content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One more of the latest Epic Games initiatives that involves EPAM testers in EG Media Framework testing process.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The main goal of the team is to perform testing and support the quality of all audio and video for streaming features in EG products.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The project started in July 2020. A small multinational team executes tests for smartphones, tablets, PC, laptops and for some of the most popular gaming consoles:  20 game consoles, 7 mobile devices and 4 PC/laptops to perform their activities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":66804,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e859898d-6ea2-42dd-b096-d970c5adfa9a/13.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e859898d-6ea2-42dd-b096-d970c5adfa9a/13.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"13.JPG\",\"name\":\"13.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e859898d-6ea2-42dd-b096-d970c5adfa9a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":942,\"height\":276},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
